caption:
Patrice Evra wants to fight Luis Suarez on his MMA debut! 🇫🇷🥊

🗣️ Evra: “They asked me who I wanted to face. I said: LUIS SUÁREZ. I’d pay out of my own pocket. He can even BITE ME.” 😭😭😭

Patrice Evra will make his MMA debut at PFL Paris, where he will fight on May 23. 🇫🇷

As a reminder, Evra accused the Uruguayan of hurling racist insults at him during a match between Liverpool and Manchester United 14 years ago.

Who would win? 👇
